languages.text:
Предметы из правой части окна трофеев попадают в ваш инвентарь — такие предметы могут использоваться персонажами. Предметы из левой части упаковываются в грузы корабля — в дальнейшем вы сможете использовать их для торговли с разными фракциями.
Вы можете перемещать предметы из одной части окна в другую по одному — для этого выделите предмет и нажмите {console_bind|Confirm}. Нажатием {console_bind|LeftUp} можно переместить все предметы на половину окна, соответствующую грузам, а нажатием {console_bind|RightUp} — на половину, соответствующую инвентарю. Когда предметы в окне трофеев распределены, удерживайте {console_bind|Func01}, чтобы они переместились в грузы или инвентарь соответственно.

traits.locale_text:
Если вы разместите трофеи в правой части, то они попадут в ваш инвентарь команды.
Всё, что находится в левой части будет упаковано в грузовые контейнеры для дальнейшего обмена с разными фракциями.
Вы можете перемещать предметы вручную, для этого выделите предмет и нажмите {console_bind | Confirm} или воспользоваться кнопками массового переноса предметов в зону грузов или инвентаря.

languages.text:
Trophies on the right side of the trophy window go to your inventory — such items can be used or equipped by your characters. Trophies on the left are packed up as cargo and sent to your ship, which can later be used to trade with various factions.
You can move trophies manually from one side of the window to the other. To do this, select a trophy and press {console_bind|Confirm}. Alternatively, you can mass transfer all trophies to the cargo (press {console_bind|LeftUp}) or inventory (press {console_bind|RightUp}) section of the trophy window or vice versa. Hold {console_bind|Func01} to transfer the trophies from both sides of the trophy window to the corresponding windows.
languages.original_text:
Предметы из правой части окна трофеев попадают в ваш инвентарь — такие предметы могут использоваться персонажами. Предметы из левой части упаковываются в грузы корабля — в дальнейшем вы сможете использовать их для торговли с разными фракциями.
Вы можете перемещать предметы из одной части окна в другую по одному — для этого выделите предмет и нажмите {console_bind|Confirm}. Нажатием {console_bind|LeftUp} можно переместить все предметы на половину окна, соответствующую грузам, а нажатием {console_bind|RightUp} — на половину, соответствующую инвентарю. Когда предметы в окне трофеев распределены, удерживайте {console_bind|Func01}, чтобы они переместились в грузы или инвентарь соответственно.

traits.locale_text:
Items on the right side of the trophy collection window go to your inventory — such items can be used or equipped by your characters. Items on the left are packed as your ship's cargo, which can later be used to trade with various factions.
You can move trophies manually from one side of the window to the other. To do this, select an item and press {console_bind|Confirm}. Alternatively, you can mass transfer all items to cargo (hold {console_bind|Func01}) or your inventory (hold {console_bind|Func02}).

Trophies on the right side of the trophy window go to your inventory — such items can be used or equipped by your characters. Trophies on the left are packed up as cargo and sent to your ship, which can later be used to trade with various factions.
You can move trophies manually from one side of the window to the other. To do this, select a trophy and press {console_bind|Confirm}. Alternatively, you can mass transfer all trophies to the cargo (press {console_bind|LB}) or inventory (press {console_bind|RB}) section of the trophy window or vice versa. Hold {console_bind|Func01} to transfer the trophies from both sides of the trophy window to the corresponding windows.

Trophies on the right side of the trophy window go to your inventory — such items can be used or equipped by your characters. Trophies on the left are packed up as cargo and sent to your ship, which can later be used to trade with various factions.
You can move trophies manually from one side of the window to the other. To do this, select a trophy and press {console_bind|Confirm}. Alternatively, you can mass transfer all trophies to the cargo (press {console_bind|LB}) or inventory (press {console_bind|RB}) section of the trophy window or vice versa. Hold {console_bind|Func01} to transfer the trophies from both sides of the trophy window to the corresponding windows.

You can move trophies manually from one side of the window to the other. To do this, select an item and press {console_bind|Confirm}. Alternatively, you can mass transfer all items to cargo (hold {console_bind|Func01}) or your inventory (hold {console_bind|Func02}).

Trophies on the right side of the trophy window go to your inventory — such items can be used or equipped by your characters. Trophies on the left are packed up as cargo and sent to your ship, which can later be used to trade with various factions.
You can move trophies manually from one side of the window to the other. To do this, select a trophy and press {console_bind|Confirm}. Alternatively, you can mass transfer all trophies to the cargo (press {console_bind|LB}) or inventory (press {console_bind|RB}) section of the trophy window or vice versa. Hold {console_bind|Func01} to transfer the trophies from both sides of the trophy window to the corresponding windows.

languages.text:
Los trofeos a la derecha de la ventana de trofeos van a tu inventario. Tus personajes podrán usar o equipar estos objetos. Los trofeos de la izquierda se añaden al cargamento y se envían a tu nave. Más adelante te pueden servir para comerciar con distintas facciones.
Puedes mover los trofeos de un lado de la ventana al otro. Basta con seleccionar un trofeo y pulsar {console_bind|Confirm}. Alternativamente, puedes transferir todos los trofeos a la sección de cargamento (pulsa {console_bind|LeftUp}) o inventario (pulsa {console_bind|RightUp}). Mantén {console_bind|Func01} para transferir los objetos de ambos lados de la ventana a sus ventanas correspondientes.
languages.original_text:
Trophies on the right side of the trophy window go to your inventory — such items can be used or equipped by your characters. Trophies on the left are packed up as cargo and sent to your ship, which can later be used to trade with various factions.
You can move trophies manually from one side of the window to the other. To do this, select a trophy and press {console_bind|Confirm}. Alternatively, you can mass transfer all trophies to the cargo (press {console_bind|LeftUp}) or inventory (press {console_bind|RightUp}) section of the trophy window or vice versa. Hold {console_bind|Func01} to transfer the trophies from both sides of the trophy window to the corresponding windows.

languages.text:
戦利品ウィンドウの右側にある戦利品はインベントリに移動し、キャラクターが使用したり装備できる。左側の戦利品は貨物として船に積まれ、後にさまざまな勢力との取り引きに使うことができる。
戦利品はウィンドウの片側から反対側へ手動で移動させることができる。それには戦利品を選択し、{console_bind|Confirm}を押す。あるいは、すべての戦利品を貨物セクション（{console_bind|LeftUp}を押す）またはインベントリセクション（{console_bind|RightUp}を押す）に一括転送することもできる。戦利品ウィンドウの両側から戦利品を対応するウィンドウに移動させるには、{console_bind|Func01}を長押しする。
languages.original_text:
Trophies on the right side of the trophy window go to your inventory — such items can be used or equipped by your characters. Trophies on the left are packed up as cargo and sent to your ship, which can later be used to trade with various factions.
You can move trophies manually from one side of the window to the other. To do this, select a trophy and press {console_bind|Confirm}. Alternatively, you can mass transfer all trophies to the cargo (press {console_bind|LeftUp}) or inventory (press {console_bind|RightUp}) section of the trophy window or vice versa. Hold {console_bind|Func01} to transfer the trophies from both sides of the trophy window to the corresponding windows.

traits.locale_text:
戦利品ウィンドウの右側にある戦利品はインベントリに移動し、キャラクターが使用したり装備できる。左側の戦利品は貨物として船に積まれ、後にさまざまな勢力との取り引きに使うことができる。
戦利品はウィンドウの片側から反対側へ手動で移動させることができる。それには戦利品を選択し、{console_bind|Confirm}を押す。あるいは、すべての戦利品を貨物セクション（{console_bind|LB}を押す）またはインベントリセクション（{console_bind|RB}を押す）に一括転送することもできる。戦利品ウィンドウの両側から戦利品を対応するウィンドウに移動させるには、{console_bind|Func01}を長押しする。

languages.text:
战利品窗口右侧的物品会放在您的物品栏中，这些物品可以由您的角色使用或装备。左侧的战利品则会被整理好，送到飞船的货舱中，之后可以用来与各大派系进行交易。
您可以通过手动的方式，将战利品从窗口一侧拖拽至另一侧。若要移动战利品，只要选择战利品之后按下{console_bind|Confirm}即可。除此之外，您还可以将战利品批量移动至货舱（按下{console_bind|LeftUp}）或批量移动至物品栏（按下{console_bind|RightUp}），或反向移动。按住{console_bind|Func01}即可将两侧的战利品转移至相应窗口。

Trophies on the right side of the trophy window go to your inventory — such items can be used or equipped by your characters. Trophies on the left are packed up as cargo and sent to your ship, which can later be used to trade with various factions.
You can move trophies manually from one side of the window to the other. To do this, select a trophy and press {console_bind|Confirm}. Alternatively, you can mass transfer all trophies to the cargo (press {console_bind|LeftUp}) or inventory (press {console_bind|RightUp}) section of the trophy window or vice versa. Hold {console_bind|Func01} to transfer the trophies from both sides of the trophy window to the corresponding windows.

languages.text: Trophäen auf der rechten Seite des Trophäenfensters wandern in dein Inventar und können von deinen Charakteren verwendet oder ausgerüstet werden. Trophäen auf der linken Seite werden als Fracht verstaut und deinem Schiff geschickt, damit du sie später mit verschiedenen Gruppierungen tauschen kannst. Du kannst Trophäen manuell von einer Seite des Fensters auf die andere verschieben. Wähle dazu eine Trophäe aus und drücke {console_bind|Confirm}. Du kannst aber auch alle Trophäen manuell in den Fracht- (mit {console_bind|LeftUp}) oder Inventar-Bereich (mit {console_bind|RightUp}) des Trophäenfensters verschieben und umgekehrt. Halte {console_bind|Func01}, um die Trophäen von beiden Seiten des Trophäenfensters in die entsprechenden Fenster zu verschieben.
languages.original_text:
Trophies on the right side of the trophy window go to your inventory — such items can be used or equipped by your characters. Trophies on the left are packed up as cargo and sent to your ship, which can later be used to trade with various factions.

Hold {console_bind|Func01} to transfer the trophies from both sides of the trophy window to the corresponding windows.

Trophäen auf der linken Seite werden als Fracht verstaut und deinem Schiff geschickt, damit du sie später mit verschiedenen Gruppierungen tauschen kannst.Du kannst Trophäen manuell von einer Seite des Fensters auf die andere verschieben. Wähle dazu eine Trophäe aus und drücke {console_bind|Confirm}. Du kannst aber auch alle Trophäen manuell in den Fracht- (mit {console_bind|LB}) oder Inventar-Bereich (mit {console_bind|RB}) des Trophäenfensters verschieben und umgekehrt. Halte {console_bind|Func01}, um die Trophäen von beiden Seiten des Trophäenfensters in die entsprechenden Fenster zu verschieben.

languages.text:
Les objets situés à droite de la fenêtre des trophées sont placés dans votre inventaire et peuvent être utilisés ou équipés par vos personnages. Ceux de gauche rejoignent la cargaison de votre vaisseau, en vue de leur utilisation ultérieure pour commercer avec différentes factions.
Vous pouvez déplacer un trophée manuellement d'un côté à l'autre de la fenêtre en le sélectionnant avant d'appuyer sur {console_bind|Confirm}. Vous pouvez également transférer d'un seul coup tous les trophées vers les cales du vaisseau en appuyant sur {console_bind|LeftUp}) ou vers l'inventaire en actionnant {console_bind|RightUp}), et inversement. Appuyez longuement sur {console_bind|Func01} pour transférer les trophées des deux côtés de la fenêtre vers les fenêtres correspondantes.
languages.original_text:
Trophies on the right side of the trophy window go to your inventory — such items can be used or equipped by your characters. Trophies on the left are packed up as cargo and sent to your ship, which can later be used to trade with various factions.
You can move trophies manually from one side of the window to the other. To do this, select a trophy and press {console_bind|Confirm}. Alternatively, you can mass transfer all trophies to the cargo (press {console_bind|LeftUp}) or inventory (press {console_bind|RightUp}) section of the trophy window or vice versa. Hold {console_bind|Func01} to transfer the trophies from both sides of the trophy window to the corresponding windows.

traits.locale_text:
Les objets situés à droite de la fenêtre des trophées sont placés dans votre inventaire et peuvent être utilisés ou équipés par vos personnages. Ceux de gauche rejoignent la cargaison de votre vaisseau, en vue de leur utilisation ultérieure pour commercer avec différentes factions.
Vous pouvez déplacer un trophée manuellement d'un côté à l'autre de la fenêtre en le sélectionnant avant d'appuyer sur {console_bind|Confirm}. Vous pouvez également transférer d'un seul coup tous les trophées vers les cales du vaisseau en appuyant sur {console_bind|LB} ou vers l'inventaire en actionnant {console_bind|RB}, et inversement. Appuyez longuement sur {console_bind|Func01} pour transférer les trophées des deux côtés de la fenêtre vers les fenêtres correspondantes.

languages.text:
Ganimet penceresinin sağ tarafındaki ganimetler envanterine gider. Karakterlerin bu tarz eşyaları kullanabilir veya kuşanabilir. Sol taraftaki ganimetler ise paketlenir ve kargo olarak gemine gönderilir. Bunları daha sonra çeşitli fraksiyonlarla ticaret yapmak için kullanabilirsin.
Ganimetleri pencerenin bir tarafından diğerine elle taşıyabilirsin. Bunu yapmak için bir ganimet seç ve {console_bind|Confirm} düğmesine bas. Alternatif olarak, tüm ganimetleri ganimet penceresinin kargo ({console_bind|LeftUp} düğmesine bas) veya envanter ({console_bind|RightUp} düğmesine bas) bölümüne ya da tam aksine toplu olarak aktarabilirsin. Ganimet penceresinin her iki tarafındaki ganimetleri ilgili pencerelere aktarmak için {console_bind|Func01} düğmesini basılı tut.
languages.original_text:
Trophies on the right side of the trophy window go to your inventory — such items can be used or equipped by your characters. Trophies on the left are packed up as cargo and sent to your ship, which can later be used to trade with various factions.
You can move trophies manually from one side of the window to the other. To do this, select a trophy and press {console_bind|Confirm}. Alternatively, you can mass transfer all trophies to the cargo (press {console_bind|LeftUp}) or inventory (press {console_bind|RightUp}) section of the trophy window or vice versa. Hold {console_bind|Func01} to transfer the trophies from both sides of the trophy window to the corresponding windows.
